ground_truth.thought: 评估这些因素对我当前投资组合的潜在风险
ground_truth.name: MacroEconomics.evaluate_portfolio_risk

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'MacroEconomics.get_latest_data', 'description': 'Get the latest macroeconomic data including GDP, inflation rate, unemployment rate, etc.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'Type of data needed, e.g., latest_data'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'data', 'description': 'the latest macroeconomic data'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一位投资经理，需要评估宏观经济因素对我的投资组合的影响。首先，请获取最新的宏观经济数据。然后，分析这些数据对不同资产类别的影响。接着，评估这些因素对我当前投资组合的潜在风险。最后，为我提供一个宏观经济分析报告。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取最新的宏观经济数据
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'data': {'GDP': '3.5%', 'InflationRate': '2.1%', 'UnemploymentRate': '4.2%', 'InterestRate': '1.5%'}}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
分析这些数据对不同资产类别的影响
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'data'的值是什么?
{'analysis': {'Stocks': 'Positive impact due to GDP growth', 'Bonds': 'Negative impact due to rising interest rates', 'RealEstate': 'Mixed impact due to inflation'}}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'analysis': {'Stocks': 'Positive impact due to GDP growth', 'Bonds': 'Negative impact due to rising interest rates', 'RealEstate': 'Mixed impact due to inflation'}}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 分析以上数据对不同资产类别的影响，并评估这些因素对你当前投资组合的潜在风险。最后，提供一个宏观经济分析报告。
